name: Euronydodge
description:
This is my first "completed" project.    It is a copy of the tutorial below with graphics basically palette swapped aside from the "bird" which features a custom Euronymous sprite and bgm.  I am in the process of learning Unity and coding so this is a big leap forward no matter how basic it is.  Feedback is appreciated but obviously it is just a direct clone of flappy bird and the tutorial below and my current skill set is too low to implement much more functionality.

All of this is completely new to me and I have zero background in coding or game development.  I've been a heavy gamer for the past 25 years and do have an art background (photography) but beyond that this is the first real project I have worked to completion.
